summary.para: Gets the maximum version tested from the AppxManifest.xml.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the minimum version of the target device family from the AppxManifest.xml.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the name of the target device family from the AppxManifest.xml..

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves information about the target device family from the AppxManifest.xml.
